transactions.description: Signed G Kobe Bufkin to a 10-day contract.
F Dillon Brooks was fined by the league office for confronting and directing inappropriate language toward game officials in a game played November 21.
Signed F Jeremiah Robinson-Earl to a rest-of-season contract. Waived G Monte Morris.
Signed G Garrison Mathews to a 10-day contract.
Signed G Jamaree Bouyea to a two-way contract.
Signed G Jahmai Mashack to a Two-Way Contract. Waived C PJ Hall.
Signed F Jeremiah Robinson-Earl to a 10-day contract.
Fired general manager Nico Harrison.
Signed G Wendell Moore Jr. to a two-way contract. Waived G Colby Jones.
Signed G Monte Morris to a rest-of-season contract. Waived G Mac McClung.
Claimed F Isaac Jones off waivers from the Sacramento Kings.
Signed F Cody Martin to a 10-day contract.
Exercised its fourth-year team option on G Brandon Miller and its third-year team option on F Tidjane Salan.
Signed G Mac McClung to a rest-of-season contract. Waived C James Wiseman.
Signed C Charles Bassey to a 10-day contract.
Waived G Jaden Springer.
Signed G Javonte Cooke to a two-way contract. Re-signed G Shaedon Sharpe to a rookie-scale extension.
Waived G Kobe Bufkin.
Waived F Tyler Smith.
Re-signed G Christian Braun to a rookie-scale extension.
Re-signed G Dyson Daniels to a rookie-scale extension.
Waived F Dillon Jones.
Re-signed F Kevin Durant to a two-year contract extension.
Waived Gs Jules Bernard, Tristen Newton and Zyon Pullin and F Alize Johnson. Converted G Johnny Juzang to a two-way contract. Exercised team options on Gs Rob Dillingham and Terrence Shannon Jr.
Waived C Mo Bamba, F Pedro Bradshaw, and G Sean East II.
